wikipedia_page.main: Harry George Crandon VC (12 February 1874 – 2 January 1953) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * Harry George Crandon – awarded the Victoria Cross during the Boer War.

response: |Harry George Crandon || British Army || 1901 || Second Anglo-Boer War || Springbok Laagte
